Package com.tloj.game.collectables

Class PurchasableItem

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.collectables.Item
com.tloj.game.collectables.PurchasableItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttackElixir, DefenseElixir, Emp, GreatHealthPotion, GreatManaPotion, HealthPotion, ManaPotion, Ragu, WeaponShard
public abstract class PurchasableItem extends Item
An abstract class representing an item that can be purchased in the game via Merchant
This class is meant to be extended by specific purchasable items, guaranteeing modularity
